Twirl and Swirl

Did you ever wonder what happens when you flush?

Whatever you flush goes down into the pipe that
leads out of your house and into the system.
From there it travels, mostly by gravity,
to a treatment plant.

RELOAD

Drag and drop items into the toilet
and flush to find out what
happens when you send the
wrong things down the drain.
